title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in two-sided cross, long-armed cross, eyelet, knot, back, and double running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Long narrow rectangle with geometric pattern bands at the top, followed by spot motifs and religious motifs including the crucifixion and the Lamb of God; near the bottom a large house with a path leading up to it.
name: Sampler
